flavor: The densest information cluster in the galaxy.
printed_text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.

flavor: The Once and Future Android.
printed_text: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.
stripped_printed_text: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.

printed_text: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.

printed_text:
When you score this agenda, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in the root of and/or protecting that server, ignoring all install costs.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in the root of and/or protecting that server, ignoring all install costs. Limit 1 per deck.

printed_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click]. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. click, hosted agenda counter: Gain click click. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.

printed_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Project Wotan when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Choose a rezzed piece of bioroid ice currently being approached. For the remainder of this run, that ice gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Project Wotan when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Choose a rezzed piece of bioroid ice currently being approached. For the remainder of this run, that ice gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines.

flavor: "Why limit our best assets to our own servers? The enemy doesn't stay passively at home, waiting for us to come to him. Why should we?" -Director Haas
printed_text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 brain damage, do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 brain damage, do 1 net damage.

flavor: The Alix model was based on a successful hedge fund manager but she had a tendency to burn out. Literally.
printed_text:
Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.
stripped_printed_text: Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card. click,trash: Gain 2 credits for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.

printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset, you may pay 3[credit]. If you do, do 1 brain damage for each hosted advancement token.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset, you may pay 3 credits. If you do, do 1 brain damage for each hosted advancement token.

printed_text:
You have +1 allotted [click] on your turn.
When this asset is trashed while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
stripped_printed_text: You have +1 allotted click on your turn. When this asset is trashed while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

printed_text: Haas Arcology AI can be advanced only while unrezzed. [click], hosted advancement token: Gain [click][click]. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Haas Arcology AI can be advanced only while unrezzed. click, hosted advancement token: Gain click click. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: Thomas, the director's son, has been carefully groomed to inherit the corporation since before he was born. His favorite pastime appears to be disappointing his mother.
printed_text:
Thomas Haas can be advanced.
[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
stripped_printed_text: Thomas Haas can be advanced. trash: Gain 2 credits for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.

printed_text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
stripped_printed_text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

flavor: Success is defined by the safety of data, not the safety of potential intruders.
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during his or her last turn.
Gain 7[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during his or her last turn. Gain 7 credits.

flavor: The realm beyond is still forbidden.
printed_text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage and end the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage and end the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "Yeah. It made a loud noise, I got scared, and I jacked out. I still think I made the right decision." -g00ru
printed_text: [subroutine] You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.

flavor: The game has changed.
printed_text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.

flavor: Sometimes you just have to guess.
printed_text: [subroutine] You may install a piece of ice from HQ as the outermost piece of ice protecting this server, ignoring all install costs.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You may install a piece of ice from HQ as the outermost piece of ice protecting this server, ignoring all install costs.

printed_text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Hosted power counter: Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Hosted power counter: Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: A mind of meat! How does it work?
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost a [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost a [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine If the Runner has lost a click to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage. Subroutine If the Runner has lost a click to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage.

printed_text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7[credit], to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.
stripped_printed_text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7 credits, to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.

printed_text: [interrupt] → When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.
stripped_printed_text: Interrupt -> When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.

flavor: Sell the dream-show them how very much they want to be rich, and they'll convince themselves that someday, they will be. How can they revolt against their future selves? -the New Gospel of Wealth
printed_text: [click], [click]: Gain 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: click, click: Gain 3 credits.

flavor: "Just another factory, making good corporate drones for the machine. Their CS department is the best in the world, though." -g00ru
printed_text: [click], 1[credit]: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: click, 1 credit: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

flavor: "There's only a 5% chance this could result in a general failure."
printed_text:
Gain 2[credit] when your turn begins.
Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 2 credits when your turn begins. Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.

flavor: The principle behind ice is not to keep everyone out, but to let only some people in. This ice denies entry on all but a select few ports that might change with the time of day or picosecond of connection. If you don't know what port to use, you're not getting in. Period.
printed_text: [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "Cheap, off-the-shelf data protection. Cheap for them, that is. Not for us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
printed_text:
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2[credit], end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner must pay 2 credits, if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2 credits, end the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
printed_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.

flavor: "New technology destroys the old."
printed_text: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.
stripped_printed_text: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.

flavor: "I can make that work."
printed_text: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.

printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers. (Do not rez or derez any ice or change the number of ice protecting any server.)
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers. (Do not rez or derez any ice or change the number of ice protecting any server.)

flavor: Wheeeee!
printed_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, remove up to 3 advancement counters from 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server.
stripped_printed_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, remove up to 3 advancement counters from 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server.

flavor: "Idealism's great, but it don't keep you in soybeef tacos." -Matt "TheMerc" Thomas
printed_text: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2[credit] for each program trashed.
stripped_printed_text: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2 credits for each program trashed.

flavor: One man's trash.
printed_text: Trash 1 installed program. If you do, install 1 program from your grip or heap, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the install cost of the program you trashed.
stripped_printed_text: Trash 1 installed program. If you do, install 1 program from your grip or heap, paying X credits less. X is equal to the install cost of the program you trashed.

flavor: Spend too much time in the AR Lab and someone might notice. Unless you're the head of it, that is.
printed_text: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack. Draw 5 cards. Remove Levy AR Lab Access from the game instead of trashing it.
stripped_printed_text: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack. Draw 5 cards. Remove Levy AR Lab Access from the game instead of trashing it.

printed_text: +3[mu] When you install Monolith, install up to 3 programs from your grip, lowering the install cost of each by 4[credit]. Trash a program from your grip: Prevent 1 brain or net damage. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +3 mu When you install Monolith, install up to 3 programs from your grip, lowering the install cost of each by 4 credits. Trash a program from your grip: Prevent 1 brain or net damage. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: It still hurts, a bit, the first time. The second time, you feel nothing at all. But don't push your luck.
printed_text:
3[credit]: Prevent 1 net damage.
[trash]: Prevent up to 2 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: 3 credits: Prevent 1 net damage. trash: Prevent up to 2 brain damage.

flavor: It is good practice to backup the backup.
printed_text: [trash]: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).
stripped_printed_text: trash: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).

printed_text:
Omni-drive can host a single program of 1[mu] or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.
stripped_printed_text: Omni-drive can host a single program of 1 mu or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.

flavor: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
printed_text:
When you install this program, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on it.
This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength.
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, you may pay X credits to place X power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine.

flavor: "No line that they lay could catch a shadow on the wall…"
printed_text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
stripped_printed_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.

flavor: "…and once the shadow rises, the curtain shall fall." -revenant
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

printed_text:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana. If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.

printed_text: When you install this program, choose a server. Use this program only during runs on the chosen server. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, choose a server. Use this program only during runs on the chosen server. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: Perfect for flooding servers.
printed_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.

flavor: "Make sure you tell the source code which executable you want it to compile into. One time I left my rig for a couple of minutes, and when I came back all of my files had been replaced with cat vids." -The Professor
printed_text: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for a program. Install it.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits, trash: Search your stack for a program. Install it.

flavor: Out there, the thousand-petaled lotus symbolizes detachment from illusion. In here, it is the birthplace of a higher consciousness. Something infinitely pure.
printed_text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).

flavor: "The Incans believed that the sun god resided in the Haman Pacha, the upper realm of the cosmos. They just didn't know that the Haman Pacha hadn't been discovered yet." -The Professor
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

flavor: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.
printed_text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.

flavor: Some people have their own satellite receiver. Others have their own satellite.
printed_text:
+1[link]
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: +1 link Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.

flavor: "If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
printed_text:
Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1[credit] on Ice Analyzer.
You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1 credit on Ice Analyzer. You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.

flavor: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…
printed_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5 credits.

flavor: "We say 'cyber-terrorist', they hear 'underground celebrity.'" -Michael Muhama, professional expert
printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this resource.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this resource.

flavor: Just me, a cup of YucaBean, and last night's Hong Kong Trunk sniffed packets. I call that a good morning.
printed_text: [click], [click], [trash]: Play an event from your heap (paying its play cost).
stripped_printed_text: click, click, trash: Play an event from your heap (paying its play cost).

flavor: A dangerous game, but well worth playing.
printed_text:
The advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, you must pay 3[credit].
Trash The Source when an agenda is scored or stolen.
stripped_printed_text: The advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, you must pay 3 credits. Trash The Source when an agenda is scored or stolen.
